sys_ui_message.key: The Elements filter applies personalization to the first breakdown of indicators that support the aggregate view. For other indicators, select a filter that returns only one element.
sys_ui_message.message: The Elements filter applies personalization to the first breakdown of indicators that support the aggregate view. For other indicators, select a filter that returns only one element.
sys_ui_message.sys_name: The Elements filter applies personalization to the first breakdown of indicators that support the aggregate view. For other indicators, select a filter that returns only one element.
